attributes.action: Consider giving adults suffering from Rheumatoid Arthritis free prescriptions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adults who suffer from Rheumatoid Arthritis have to pay full charges or pay for a pre-payment certificate to obtain the medication they need to have a relatively pain free existence. If medication is stopped a flare up is extremely painful and also costly to the NHS if the sufferer has to go into hospital for treatment.
Many sufferers have at least 5 or 6 items a month and many have a lot more, and to have to pay for them is unfair, when other diseases qualify for free prescriptions because they need them to be able to have a quality of life. Please support the people who suffer in silence with an almost invisible disease to be able to afford their medication.
